mapper.select: SELECT l.longcook_id AS longcookId, m.username AS username, m.nickname AS nickname, l.title AS title, l.longcook_url AS longcookUrl, l.regdate AS regdate, TO_CHAR(m.profile_img) AS profileImage FROM longcook l INNER JOIN member m on l.member_id = m.member_id WHERE l.longcook_id = #{longcookId}
